mapper.select: select code_type as codeType,value,dicdetail_name as dicdetailName,update_user as updateUser from masterbasic.bs_dicdetail where left(`UPDATE_TIME`,16) = left(date_add(now(), interval -1 minute),16);
mapper.update: update masterbasic.bs_dicdetail set `VALUE` = #{value} where code_type in ('wms5-wave-package','wms5_wave_orderType','wms5_wave_MergeFlag','ParcelProduction');
